text:
="preserve">Osvaldo "Chiche" Sosa (26 January 1945 – 6 July 2020) was an Argentine football manager and player. He worked as the manager of Atlético Tucumán in the Primera División Argentina. He was born in Buenos Aires. He was also known for playing with and managing Club Almagro.
Sosa died on 6 July 2020 from stroke-related problems in Buenos Aires, aged 75.
